title: Futbol Americas: Pulisic needs to leave Chelsea now?
description:
On Monday’s episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez react to Christian Pulisic starting the London Derby on the bench. Does he need to leave Chelsea now? The guys also discuss Sergiño Dest being left off the matchday squad for Barcelona's LaLiga season opener. Then, Herc has a one-on-one interview with USMNT midfielder Luca de la Torre where he talks about his move to RC Celta and the USMNT. Next, the guys recap the weekend action in MLS and Liga MX.
